00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkPdfComposite.rdl,v 1.1 2005/10/09 22:50:37 abi Exp $
00005  * Authors:
00006  *   Abi Soffer, Colorado State University, abi@slac.stanford.edu
00007  * Description:
00008  *   Base class for composite Pdf wrappers. Subclasses need to use the 
00009  *   addComponent function to add their components. They also need to 
00010  *   implement BdkPdfAbsBase functionalities.
00011  * History:
00012  *   21-Mar-2002 abi Created initial version
00013  *   28-Mar-2002 ww  add dependents()
00014  *
00015  * Copyright (C) 2002 Colorado State University and SLAC
00016  *****************************************************************************/
00017 #ifndef BDKPDFCOMPOSITE
00018 #define BDKPDFCOMPOSITE
00019 
00020 #include "TList.h"
00021 #include "BToDKTo3piK/BdkPdfAbsBase.hh"
00022 
00023 class RooArgSet;
00024 class RooArgList;
00025 
00026 class BdkPdfComposite : public BdkPdfAbsBase {
00027 public:
00028   BdkPdfComposite();
00029   BdkPdfComposite(BdkPdfComposite & other); // argument non-const!
00030 
00031   BdkPdfComposite(const char * name, const char * desc);
00032 
00033   BdkPdfComposite(const char * name, const char * desc, 
00034                   BdkPdfAbsBase & component);
00035 
00036   BdkPdfComposite(const char * name, const char * desc, 
00037                   BdkPdfAbsBase & component1, BdkPdfAbsBase & component2);
00038 
00039   BdkPdfComposite(const char * name, const char * desc, TList & components);
00040 
00041   ~BdkPdfComposite();
00042 
00043   BdkPdfComposite & operator=(BdkPdfComposite & other); // argument non-const
00044 
00045   // Modifiers:
00046   virtual void setVerbose(const char * val);
00047 
00048   // Non-const accessors:
00049   TIterator * compIter() {return _components.MakeIterator();}
00050   BdkPdfAbsBase * component(int i) {return (BdkPdfAbsBase *)_components.At(i);}
00051 
00052   // dependents() loops over dependents of _components
00053   virtual RooArgSet dependents();  
00054 
00055   // subDependents() may be implemented by subclasses, returning the 
00056   // dependents that are UNRELATED to those of the _components. Since
00057   // this is not envisioned to be the case often, the function is 
00058   // implemented here to return an empty RooArgSet:
00059   virtual RooArgSet subDependents();
00060 
00061   // Returns a list of the RooAbsPdfs of the _coponents. This is
00062   // useful for sums and product wrappers subclasses:
00063   virtual RooArgList componentPdfs();
00064   
00065 
00066   // Accessors:
00067   inline const TList & getComponents() const {return _components;};
00068   int numComponents() const;
00069 
00070   // Overrides base class function. Checks its own _isValid, as well
00071   // as that of all components, returns true only if all are true:
00072   virtual Bool_t getIsValid() const; 
00073 
00074 protected:
00075   // Helpers:
00076   void addComponent(BdkPdfAbsBase & component);
00077   void addComponent(BdkPdfAbsBase * component);
00078   void setComponents(TList & components); // erases previous components
00079   void removeComponents();
00080   inline TList & components() {return _components;};
00081 
00082 
00083 private:
00084   TList _components;
00085 
00086 #if !defined(__INTERACTIVE__) 
00087     ClassDef (BdkPdfComposite,0) // Composite pdf wrapper 
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 };
00091 
00092 #endif
